    • Uses of CatalogTransformerException in org.codice.ddf.transformer.xml.streaming.lib

      Methods in org.codice.ddf.transformer.xml.streaming.lib that throw CatalogTransformerException 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      Metacard SaxEventHandlerDelegate.read(InputStream inputStream)
      Takes in an InputStream returns a Metacard, populated with all the Attributes parsed by the SaxEventHandlerDelegate.eventHandlers
      Metacard XmlInputTransformer.transform(InputStream inputStream)
      Takes in an XML InputStream and returns a populated Metacard The Metacard is populated with all attributes that have been parsed by the SaxEventHandlers declared in XmlInputTransformer.saxEventHandlerConfigurations
      Metacard XmlInputTransformer.transform(InputStream inputStream, String id)
      Takes in an XML InputStream and an ID and returns a populated Metacard The Metacard is populated with all attributes that have been parsed by the SaxEventHandlers declared in XmlInputTransformer.saxEventHandlerConfigurations and with the specific ID
